Record.Description: A commercial combination preparation, by Bradley Pharmaceuticals, containing a mixture of polyethylene glycols, glycerol and caprylic/capric triglyceride with lubrication activity. Lubrin is used to relieve discomfort due to vaginal dryness when applied intravaginally.
